GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves one article selected by id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id sorted by their created_at attribute in descending order

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a new comment to an article and responds with the posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates and returns the selected article in accordance with the input body, where { inc_votes : 1 } will increment the vote property of given article by 1 and {inc_votes: -1} will decrement it by 1

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: it should delete the given comment by comment_id and respond with status 204 and no content

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

POST /api/articles.description: creates a new article with the input keys: author, title, body, topic and article_img_url. Then returns it as response with the additional keys of article_id, created_at, votes and comment_count
